title: The 25 Best Hinge Prompts for Women to Get Responses

steps.content: Offer a cheeky invite to treat your dateâ€¦but name your conditions. steps.content: Parse out the midday sleepers from the sunrise marathoners. As simple as it may seem, there are few things as telling about a person as what they use their Sundays for. steps.content: Open with a crucial piece of info about youâ€¦or your #1 dealbreaker. steps.content: Give your matches some insight into your quirkier side! This prompt is perfect for balancing out some more serious or straightforward answers about yourself and your interests. steps.content: Hereâ€™s a prompt where you can reveal your most defining hobby or interest. steps.title: This *simple* prompt can easily forge a personal connection.
steps.content: This *simple* prompt can easily forge a personal connection. Strip back the layers and tell your potential matches about those little things that make you feel content in life. Save obvious info like hobbies, personality traits, and travel anecdotes for a different prompt, and share something unique that always manages to fill you with (potentially unexpected) joy. â€œStimulating but easy conversations over my favorite bottle of red.â€ â€œA Costco hot dog.â€ â€œSlurpees, Instagram reels, and napping with my dog.â€ â€œWalking outside after a summer storm.â€

steps.content: Let your matches in on one of your â€œworstâ€ qualities with this prompt. steps.content: Nothing starts a conversation better than a hotly-debated topic. This prompt is one of the most highly responded-to ones on the appâ€”and for good reason! steps.content: Share your most vital deal-breakers with this direct and simple prompt. steps.content: This straightforward prompt is sure to pull in your perfect match! steps.content: Search for common ground with this assertive prompt. steps.content: Give your matches a solid idea of who you are and what you're looking for. steps.content: Lay it all on the line by stating exactly what you want in a relationship. â€œHinge is more common for individuals searching for serious relationships and not just a hook-up,â€ reveals Sanders. steps.title: Sharing love languages right away can transform a new relationship.
steps.content: Sharing love languages right away can transform a new relationship. Knowing your partnerâ€™s love language (and having them understand yours) will give both of you an opportunity to show appreciation and care to each other. steps.content: Tell your date exactly how to sweep you off your feet. steps.content: Skip the small talk and get closer to an IRL date with your matches. This ideal prompt basically gives your matches a road map to taking you outâ€¦which is the goal, right? â€œWhen youâ€™re online dating, you should only be using it as a tool to get offline,â€ says Avgitidis.
